bioAsHtml: Filip is researcher in programming languages at Czech Technical University where he focuses on static and dynamic program analysis. He got his PhD at University of Nice and did his postdoc duties at INRIA and Northeastern University. Before joining academia, he was working as a software engineering at Sun Microsystems designing security tools, TomTom analysing traffic data, and Oracle building clouds.

acceptedTalks.title: Everything you ever wanted to know about Scala implicits, but weren't sure how to ask

bio: Filip is researcher in programming languages at Czech Technical University where he focuses on static and dynamic program analysis. He got his PhD at University of Nice and did his postdoc duties at INRIA and Northeastern University. Before joining academia, he was working as a software engineering at Sun Microsystems designing security tools, TomTom analysing traffic data, and Oracle building clouds.
